long_description: The Nite Ize Sideways Clip Case keeps your gadget arsenal nigh, securing your phone and other items right at your side. Built from a tough nylon material that resists abrasion for lasting service. Stretch nylon side panels expand to accommodate various thicknesses of cell phones or other electronic devices. Strong, wide plastic clip secures to belts or webbing up to 2 in. wide; it holds your device in a fixed horizontal position. Internal stretch-nylon loop secures a penlight, small multi-tool or pen. Tooth Ferry(TM) universal wireless hands-free headset holder features a convenient elastic pull tab to quickly dock or undock unit. Rip-and-stick flap closure secures phone or other items inside case to prevent loss during activity.
short_description: The Nite Ize Sideways Clip Case keeps your gadget arsenal nigh, securing your phone and other items right at your side.
